name: Color Fanatic Multi-Tasking Deep-Conditioning Hair Mask
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is:An intensely moisturizing treatment mask that restores, protects, and strengthens color-treated hair..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Coily, Curly, Straight, and Wavy.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Nourishes and restores hair.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Camelina Oil: Nourishes hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This multi-tasking formula includes a signature aromatherapy blend of rose, floral ginger, and cedarwood and 21 benefits:
ingredients: -Camelina Oil: Nourishes hair. .-Coconut Oil: Moisturizes hair. .-Olive Oil: Adds shine. ..Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Esters, Parfum / Fragrance, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trideceth-6, Olea Europaea Oil / Olive Fruit Oil, Camelina Sativa Oil / Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Xylose, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Chlorhexidine Dihydrochloride, Linalool, Helianthus Annuus Seed Extract / Sunflower Seed Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, 2-Oleamido-1,3-Octadecanediol, Geraniol, Bht, Melanin, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a quarter-size amount to shampooed hair, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends..-Gently massage through hair..-Wait five minutes..-Rinse..-Pro tips: .-Use weekly to maintain the shine of a color service. .-For a deep treatment, apply to damp hair at night. .-Loosely braid hair and sleep. .-In the morning, rinse and style as usual.
